adHeader: 100 % financing for Fixers with 7 day closing
adDetails: I provide 100% Financing for Real Estate Loan. Home could require lots of work and condition is not important. The property must have a great upside potential after fix up. For information, please email your contact info and the scenario. Do to large number of request for information, I will only respond to emails that contain information on the property like purchase price, amount of needed work, future value after work completed, the city where the home is located. This loan is ONLY for NON-owner occupied and the house must be located in the Bay Area. Prefer to work with experienced flippers and I will do loans up to 80% ARV. Thank you
